title: MD
biography: Ravindra Narayana Ravi is an Indian politician and former bureaucrat serving as the 15th and current Governor of Tamil Nadu since 2021. Earlier, he served as the Governor of Nagaland and the Meghalaya.
aiSummary: R. N. Kalita is a neuroinfection research specialist with an H-index of 25 at Neurology (Member). Has been published in Nature Photonics, Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
